name: 666: The Haunted House
overview: 666 The Haunted House is an illustrated text adventure, released for the TRS-80 Color Computer in 1987 originally, and updated in 2003, at which time it was also converted to the Japanese MSX computers. The story goes like this... One of your ancestors has made a pact with the DEVIL himself This pact has doomed all your family generations Now it is up to you to destroy the pact in the place it was sealed... ...and FLEE the house!
